member.name: T:System.UriTemplate
member.summary: A class that represents a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) template.

member.name: M:System.UriTemplate.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified template string.

member.name: M:System.UriTemplate.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: A value that specifies whether trailing slash “/” characters should be ignored.

member.name: M:System.UriTemplate.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: true if the trailing slash “/” characters are ignored; otherwise false.
A dictionary that contains a list of default values for the template parameters.

member.name: M:System.UriTemplate.#ctor(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: A dictionary that contains a list of default values for the template parameters.

member.name: M:System.UriTemplate.BindByName(System.Uri,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Creates a new URI from the template and the collection of parameters.
member.returns: A URI.
member.param: A dictionary that contains a collection of parameter name/value pairs.

member.name: M:System.UriTemplate.BindByName(System.Uri,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new URI from the template and the collection of parameters.
member.returns: A URI.
member.param: A URI that contains the base address.
A dictionary that contains a collection of parameter name/value pairs.
true is the default values are ignored; otherwise false.

member.name: P:System.UriTemplate.IgnoreTrailingSlash
member.summary: Specifies whether trailing slashes “/” in the template should be ignored when binding parameters to create a URI.
member.returns: true if trailing slashes “/” should be ignored, otherwise false.

member.name: P:System.UriTemplate.PathSegmentVariableNames
member.summary: Gets a collection of variable names used within path segments in the template.
member.returns: A collection of variable names that appear within the template's path segment.

member.name: P:System.UriTemplate.QueryValueVariableNames
member.summary: Gets a collection of variable names used within the query string in the template.
member.returns: A collection of template variable names that appear in the query portion of the template string.

member.name: M:System.UriTemplate.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of the instance.
member.returns: The representation of the instance.

member.name: T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: This method is not used in Silverlight version 4 Release Candidate.

The binding parameters that support modifying the bindings.

member.summary: Adds a client error inspector to the specified client runtime.

member.summary: Implements the method to support modification or extension of the client across an endpoint.

The client to which the custom behavior is applied.
member.exception: Either the of the is null.

The endpoint dispatcher to which the behavior is applied.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior.FaultExceptionEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets the flag that specifies whether a FaultException is generated when an internal server error (HTTP status code: 500) occurs.
member.returns: Returns true if the flag is enabled; otherwise returns false.

member.summary: Gets the query string converter.

member.summary: Gets the reply formatter on the client for the specified endpoint and service operation.
member.returns: An reference to the reply formatter on the client for the specified operation and endpoint.

member.summary: Gets the request formatter on the client for the specified service operation and endpoint.
member.returns: An reference to the request formatter on the client for the specified operation and endpoint.
member.param: A contract that characterizes an operation in terms of the messages it exchanges.
The service endpoint to be accessed by the client.
member.exception: The JSON format is not currently supported in Silverlight.

member.summary: Confirms that the endpoint meets the requirements for the Web programming model.
member.exception: Message headers are included or the a scheme other than HTTP(S) is used or manual addressing is configured incorrectly.

member.name: M:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior.ValidateBinding(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint)
member.summary: Ensures the binding is valid for use with the Silverlight Web Programming Model.

member.summary: Gets and sets the Accept header value from the outgoing Web request.
member.returns: The Accept header from the outgoing Web request.

member.summary: Gets and sets the content length header value of the outgoing Web request.
member.returns: The content length header of the outgoing Web request.

member.summary: Gets and sets the content type header value from the outgoing Web request.
member.returns: The content type header from the outgoing Web request.

member.summary: Gets the headers for the outgoing Web request.

member.summary: Gets and sets the IfMatch header value from the outgoing Web request.
member.returns: The IfMatch header from the outgoing Web request.

member.summary: Gets and sets the IfNoneMatch header value from the outgoing Web request.
member.returns: The IfNoneMatch header from the outgoing Web request.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.Web.OutgoingWebRequestContext.IfUnmodifiedSince

member.returns: The IfUnmodifiedSince header from the outgoing Web request.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.Web.OutgoingWebRequestContext.Method
member.summary: Gets the HTTP method of the outgoing Web request.
member.returns: The HTTP method of the outgoing Web request.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.Web.OutgoingWebRequestContext.SuppressEntityBody
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) omits data that is normally written to the entity body of the response and forces an empty response to be returned.
member.returns: If true, WCF omits any data that is normally written to the entity body of the response and forces an empty response to be returned.
